title: OCCC Summer 2016-17 Entries

embed.description: Some of you may remember that last time I ran this competition, in the middle of the year, it sort of fell off amongst the community. Well, I figured that Christmas is an appropriate time to reboot the comp, and I've decided to make the entry windows a lot larger.

body:
Hi all, sorry it's late, but this is where you can enter for the Summer 2016/17 OCCC! Read the linked post for rules and closing dates, etc.
Hope you all have some good stuff to enter, and that this can get your creative juices flowing. (That sounds really bad but I can't think of another way to put it so you'll just have to deal with it.)
Have fun!

Current Entries:
1. Solareclipse460: [Sallora - the Speedfreak's Daughter](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/41hOJK3j-champion-concept-sallora-the-clever-speedfreak)
2. Miss Lycanthrope: [Vienna - the Masquerade Assassin](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/fmsp73dG-vienna-the-masquerade-assassin?comment=0001)
3. Gekko: [Siab - The Stilt Stalker](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/kO7eViB8-siab-the-stilt-stalker)
4. CookedChickens: [Valorax - the hextech tank](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/ZvU9kG4r-valorax-the-hextech-tank-champ-concept-please-take-a-look-and-gimme-your-feedback?comment=000000000000)
5. CookedChickens: [Silverian - The Elementalist](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/qbtnAcsG-silverian-the-elementalist-champion-concept)

Entries have now closed, sorry about being a bit late, been caught up with HSC mid course exams. Stay tuned for the winner announcement!

replies.body:
My other entry is 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/qbtnAcsG-silverian-the-elementalist-champion-concept
Silverian- The Elementalist !! :D

I've never submitted to one of these, so I don't know if I'm doing it right but hey, no time like the present.  I've recently added summoner spells/item/champion synergies, tips for playing as or against Vienna, even some possible quotes for the in-game interactions and such.

I hope I'm not too late to the contest though.  

**Link to Vienna, The Masquerade Assassin**

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/fmsp73dG-vienna-the-masquerade-assassin?comment=0001
bump for people who may want to enter but can't find the post

I can link my post before the actual champion is finished right? Sallora is almost done, but I just need to add some more gameplay stuff and quotes! :D

**Link to the Speedfreak's Daugther**: 
>_http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/41hOJK3j-champion-concept-sallora-the-clever-speedfreak_
